scripts.compile:Square: ts-node ./ ./ProgramSamples/Square --compile && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Compiler/Main.xml ./ProgramSamples/Square/Main.xml && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Compiler/Square.xml ./ProgramSamples/Square/Square.xml && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Compiler/SquareGame.xml ./ProgramSamples/Square/SquareGame.xml && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Square/Main.vm ./ProgramSamples/Square/Main.vm && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Square/Square.vm ./ProgramSamples/Square/Square.vm && sh ../../tools/TextComparer.sh ./ProgramResults/Square/SquareGame.vm ./ProgramSamples/Square/SquareGame.vm
